title: Highly uniform platinum photodeposited hollow mesoporous titania nanoparticles for photocatalytic degradation of phenol
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00156G, Paper
Dauletkerey Kudaibergen, Geun Young Kim, Hyun-Seok Choe, Jeong-Min Park, Han-Gil Kim, Donghyun Lee, Heewoo Jeon, Changha Lee, Jae-Hyuk Kim
Pt-photodeposited hollow mesoporous titania nanoparticles exhibit excellent phenol degrading photocatalytic efficiency by providing abundant reaction sites, improved mass transport, Pt-enhanced absorption band extension, reduced eâˆ’ h+ recombination.
